title: Invesco High Yield Municipal Fund Q2 2025 Commentary (Mutual Fund:ACTHX)
description: Invesco shares its Q2 municipal bond outlook, citing strong credit fundamentals and high yields. See how they’re navigating volatility—read the full commentary.

argos_summary: Invesco’s Q2 2025 commentary on its High Yield Municipal Fund highlights robust credit fundamentals and attractive yields amid market volatility. The firm emphasizes its focus on navigating current market conditions while maintaining a strong outlook for municipal bond performance.
